super gra
Great
This is one of the games that you need to play before you can consider yourself a gamer, PLAY IT!

A stunning and utterly revolutionary game you could probably beat in one afternoon! Everything in this game is great, from the atmosphere to the writing and dark usage of comedy to the foreboding and ominous music and implications in its excellent environmental storytelling (that's both very subtle and in-your-face at the same time) to the character(s?) to the game mechanics that changed the gaming industry forever to iconic memes and jokes, the entire game is packaged and crafted beautifully. Like a cake, it has many layers. Please play this if you haven't already. It's an absolute must.
